text:
Berlin, Germany - ChartMogul

ChartMogul is SaaS analytics for Stripe, Recurly, Chargify and Braintree. Venture funded by Point 9 Cap, founded by Zendesk's head of EMEA and growing fast.

https://chartmogul.com

Open positions:

CTO

Senior DevOps Engineer

Web Developer (website)

If you're interested in learning more see https://angel.co/chartmogul or contact Nick at nick@chartmogul.com
